title: The Male Lead and I Are Trapped In A Horror Game
Death Is The Only Ending For The Villainess
summary:
Penelope Eckart reincarnated as the adopted daughter of Duke Eckart and the villainess of a reverse harem dating sim. The problem is, she entered the game at its hardest difficulty, and no matter what she does, death awaits her at every ending! Before the "real daughter" of Duke Eckart appears, she must choose one of the male leads and reach a happy ending in order to survive. But the two brothers always pick a fight with her over every little thing, as well as a crazy crown prince, whose routes all lead to death. There's even a magician who's enamoured with the female lead, and a loyal slave knight! But somehow, the favourability meters of the male leads increase the more she crosses the line with them!

This is Penelope’s survival story, who’s been dropped in an insane reverse harem dating sim!

---

**Official English Translations:** [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/villains-are-destined-to-die), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9012), [IzePress](https://yenpress.com/series/villains-are-destined-to-die)
*Tappytoon and Pocket are using the Tapas localization.*

title: Stuck in the Tower
summary: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.

title: Hades & Persephone
summary: This series including fanfic short stories about the famous couple in Greek mythology- Hades and Persephone and some other couples as well.

title: My tyrant’s husband somehow became cautious
summary:
Eurenia, the eldest daughter of Count Vincent, famously lost her eyesight and voice when she saved the madam of the Euclid dukal family from a fire.

The truth, however, is that while she did save the duchess, her loss of sight and inability to speak are due to a drug she was forced to take in order to blackmail the Euclids into marrying her to their oldest son Cassius, the future Duke of Euclid. Treated as a pawn and puppet by her family, she was used and then discarded only to die from the sideeffects of the drug.

She thought that was the end, but no: When she opened her eyes again, she had returned to four months earlier, before she had betrayed her husband by order of her family. This was her chance to divorce Cassius, who was forced to marry her, then find a cure for the sideeffects of the drug that had robbed her of her sight and voice but…

"Is the reason you've been avoiding me all this time just because you're afraid of being discovered?"

His purple eyes almost pierced her body, "It isn't because you hate me?"

Suddenly his eyes turned red, "May I come near you now?"

Then his ears also turned red...

---
Caught up in her parents' political scheme, Yurania is forced to lose her sight and voice in order to marry Duke Casius Euclid and betray him. After being imprisoned for her treachery and despised by all, she makes one dying wish to turn back time and freely live her own life. When Yurania miraculously awakens mere days before the betrayal, she seizes the opportunity to right everything...only to discover that her past relationships and all that she had known weren't what they seemed.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%AD%EA%B5%B0-%EB%82%A8%ED%8E%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EC%96%B4%EC%A9%90%EC%A7%80-%EC%A1%B0%EC%8B%A0%ED%95%B4%EC%A1%8C%EB%8B%A4/3088), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60261871)

**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000651)
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000284)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/I-Accidentally-Tamed-the-Duke/745)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/129188)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%86_%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B6%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2/595)

title: The 101st Love Confession
summary:
Lucia Agnes has confessed to her longtime crush 98 times over the past 13 years.

And Herwin Peneus has always turned her down.

After her 99th confession is also rejected, Lucia finally decides to give up on Herwin and agrees to meet a suitor chosen by her parents.

But just as she makes up her mind to get engaged to this new match, things start to take an unexpected turn...

title: The Wirepuller Gets Lucky in Happier Years
summary: When gifted fortune teller Park Doa dies, she transmigrates into the body of Bunnie, a curse absorber for the daughter of an archduke. As the new Bunnie, she befriends Demian, a boy prophesied to bring ruin to the empire. But when Bunnie reads Demian's fortune, she learns that, actually, he has the potential for greatness and prosperity, so she decides to shape him into the next emperor instead. Will these two be able to defy destiny and rewrite their futures? Or will the curse of fate prevail?

title: I’m The Princess of All
summary: Ichinose Haruma is handsome, but the girl he likes happens to be even more handsome…?!

title: Spoiled Fairytale
summary:
Late spring—on a street unusually damp and buzzing with life.
Seohee, worn out and withering under her parents’ contempt and neglect, finds herself entangled with a libertine infamous for his promiscuous private life.

“Ah. I didn’t really plan to go this far….”
“……”
“I’ll be spending the night.”

A man who freely crosses the line between kindness and cruelty.
A man who tosses around love carelessly.
A man who mocks fairytales, calling them hollow illusions—Joo Taebaek.

Wrapped in all things vivid and dazzling, he crashes into Seohee like a violent wave, shaking her to the core.

“Alright. I’ll keep your secret.”
“…Really?”
“In exchange, let me screw you—loud and wild.”

A filthy act of rebellion.
A fleeting moment of euphoria.

“No need to overthink it.”

She thought that if she assimilated with him, she might at least share in his counterfeit love.
So, she willingly threw herself into a fleeting flame.

Was she really insane? Who taught her how to seduce a man like him?

“Um… it’s over now, right?”

Seohee slightly lowered her head toward a completely dazed Taebaek.

“I have to go before midnight.”

So then—
Who really got swept up in the fire?

title: Doberman
summary:
Eden City, the second Las Vegas and a place where all pleasures of this world converge. Sarin comes to Eden City, trying to find the biological father of her niece, Hayan, using the diary of her twin sister, Irin, who died in a car accident. Along the way, Sarin encounters Owen, the king of Eden City.

Though frightened by Owen’s forceful attitude and the strange gaze that seems to desire her, Sarin chooses to stay by his side for the sake of her niece, Hayan. As she gets closer to Owen, she starts to uncover the darkness that looms over Eden City. Despite this, staying by Owen’s side becomes more natural for Sarin.

However, Sarin is also hiding a secret of her own…

title: She Wasn’t My Daugther
summary: After ten years of chopping firewood (so tired ಠ╭╮ಠ), female immortals (one after another ╮(￣⊿￣)╭) knelt down and begged me to take them as my disciples! _(´ཀ`」 ∠)_

title: Genius Archer’s Streaming
summary:
Former archery prodigy Yoo Sanghyun was destined for greatness until an injury forced him to quit. Though his coach helped him secure a stable job, he never felt like he belonged. Frustrated, he leaves it all behind to pursue game streaming. 

Leveraging his incredible archery skills and the charm of his noob character, he quickly rises to fame as "Almond." Now, he's determined to dominate the gaming world, but will his virtual success translate into something greater in real life?

title: The Bully In-Charge
summary: Mars, a boy who was reincarnated in another world, travels with the Elf slave, Lilia. His goal is to conquer the world's main dungeon and obtain a "forbidden magic book" that has powers beyond common sense. But... since he fucked with Lilia every day, his conquests tended to be delayed.

title: It’s My Destiny To Be The Hero’s Saviour
summary:
I remember the memory of my previous life when I was abused by my father for the experiment. Then I realized. According to my previous life, this is the world of fantasy fiction I’ve read. That she was born with a minor role and died before the novel even started. Ariadne thought calmly, ‘I am screwed.’

She was also screwed on a global basis, this novel has a bad ending. The end of this 10-volume Munchkin (overpowered) fantasy novel is it was the failure of the protagonist and the destruction of the world.

---
After years of torture at the hands of her own father, young elementalist Ariadne Eldier sees her chance to escape when her mother’s untimely death prompts a visit from her grandfather, a powerful archmage. Once whisked away to safety, Aria begins her plans to not only distribute an elixir for the contamination plaguing the land, but also save the protagonist and prevent this novel’s tragic ending. But with her own fated death looming, will Aria be able to become the hero this tale needs?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EA%B3%B5%EC%9D%98-%EA%B5%AC%EC%9B%90%EC%9E%90%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%A0-%EC%9A%B4%EB%AA%85%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2890), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59494826)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-heros-savior/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26301&contentId=301) (App only)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Heros-Savior/597)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112577)

title: the empresss time reversed abducted marriage
I Was Reincarnated as a Baby Fox God
summary:
The princess of the Roachim Empire was killed by her older brother.
Killed, accused of killing their father, the Emperor, she…
 
Kyuaang?
 
…was reincarnated as a divine beast?!
 
An unexpected second life.
But something seems weird?
 
The ruler of the north of the Roachim Empire.
The owner of the Idelbadour Mountains and the Ice Wall.
The Grand Duke of Elharan, whom the Emperor himself cannot approach recklessly…
 
‘My dad, so you mean I’m a divine beast?!’
 
***
 
“My lady…!”
“Please accept these tributes and send down your blessings!”
 
The villagers knelt together at once and prayed earnestly.
While wiggling and not knowing what to do, I heard the sound of laughter in my ear.
 
-Lusha got stronger!
-She’s strong! She’s fresh! She’s thrilling!
-Look at that, even the humans surrendered in the face of Lusha!

The spirits were terribly proud of her, saying that the humans were afraid because of Lusha’s power.
And they lifted her in the air and carried her.
Encompassing her was also a dazzling light that appeared out of nowhere.
Everyone who was praying opened their eyes wide.
 
“It’s the blessing of the Divine Beast!”
“Hooray for the Baby Fox!”
 
Lusha sighed.
 
“Kiiyuu…”

title: Celeb Lady
summary: The Ugly Duckling Becomes the Empire’s Top Celebrity! Juliet Karenina, the era’s hottest celebrity, wakes up in the body of noblewoman Louvetria Diorlos in another world. Faced with a clumsy body and a timid personality, Louvetria endures bullying from those around her: Twins who mock and ostracize her. Her unrequited love, Kedric, who scowls at her. Her step-grandmother, Molga, who torments her in secret. But with Juliet’s spirit inside her, Louvetria won’t tolerate it anymore. “I won’t stand for this, no matter who it is. “Louvetria’s bold transformation begins!

title: I Love the One Who Kills Me
summary:
She is someone with the nickname “Seatmate Killer”, and also one of the prettiest girl in the school. Every male student that became her seatmate has confessed to her, and all of them got rejected brutally. The one who became her new seatmate, the seat being located the furthest away from the front and beside one of the windows, thus being a godly seat that will make every male student jealous, is Narito Yuki. He is someone that generally you won’t notice at all. The entire class thought that he will fall for her in a short time, but that may not be the case……
___
[Alt Official English (Tentai Books)](https://tentaibooks.com/novel-author/aresanzui/)

title: The Devil Made Me Make a Wish
Until the Lustful Consort Bears the Bachelor King’s Child
summary: Mia, a noblewoman of the prestigious August family, lives happily until her 16th birthday, when she develops the rare “princess in heat” condition—releasing pheromones at the new moon that drive men into uncontrollable desire. Soon after, tragedy strikes: her parents die and her once-kind sister Lilith, the nation’s top magician, becomes harsh toward her. Sent on an errand, Mia is kidnapped by men who intend to offer her to Charles, the dragon-human king, believing she can bear demi-human children.

title: The Male Lead Is Unhealthily Obsessed With My Health
summary:
I was reincarnated as an extra, the non-existent childhood friend of the male lead, who dies early in the novel. I can’t even avoid the time limit dead flag. That’s why I was living like this…

 “Why aren’t you healthy?” 

“I’m healthy.”

 “Why are you sick again? Did I allow you to be sick?” 

The male lead became obsessed with my health. Oh, please, can someone get rid of this guy! — I was definitely reincarnated as an extra with no presence. But my new life is unfolding strangely. 

“Why are you doing this for me?”

 “Because I like you.” 

Suddenly the sunny male lead started sticking to me.. 

“Mom, do it for me.”

 “I’m a man.”

And a handsome guardian who became my mother (gender: male)…

 “Hello, daughter!” 

Even a dad who was supposed to die appeared before me… Also.. 

“From today on, I’m your dad.”

 A suspicious human was aiming to become my dad. Why did I put myself in this undeserved situation as an extra? Can I really become healthy?

title: Ghost Romance
summary: Seonwoo Yoo, a senior in the photography department, is working as a photographer. One day, he receives a collaboration proposal from a famous overseas magazine.For a while, such a fluttering heartRecently, a jokjok ghost taking a picture is taken together'Seon-woo', who suffered from a psychic phenomenon, tries in various ways to solve it, but it is not easy.In the meantime, the psychic picture was not taken.They find the only subject... It is none other than the most famous playboy on campus, 'Choi Moo-young! "Model? Let me do it. Go out with me instead."Will 'Seonwoo' be able to take a picture of 'Mooyoung' and debut safely in a famous overseas magazine?!The dilemma of a horror romance with him, who never wants to be involved, begins!

title: The Goal is Alimony
summary:
[Web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2494fq/)  
[Light Novel](https://over-lap.co.jp/Form/Product/ProductDetail.aspx?shop=0&pid=9784865546644&vid=&cat=NVL&swrd=)  
  
—————————————————————————-  
  
From Novel Updates:  
  
The so called 『Enjoy the Human Lives Show Humans Sent to Another World With a Cheat』was trending amongst the Gods. Kanbara Kanata, one of the chosen humans ended up incurring the Evil God’s wrath and as a result, was sent to the worst dungeon,《Cocytus》. But, in a place where he was supposed to lose his life, he met Lunaère, a self-proclaimed misanthropic immortal girl. He was saved by her, who then decided to train him ’till he could at least protect himself.  
  
「Master, I think… I’ve become strong enough.」  
  
「It’s Not enough! Erm, outside of this dungeon is a dangerous place you know!」  
  
「Seriously!? More dangerous than this place…」  
  
This is the story of Kanata who was trained by his master, who easily succumbed to loneliness, till he became the greatest hero of legend, and yet was unaware of it.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: I Healed The Male Lead’s Trauma
summary:
I was reincarnated as an extra, the non-existent childhood friend of the male lead, who dies early in the novel. I can’t even avoid the time limit dead flag. That’s why I was living like this…

 “Why aren’t you healthy?” 

“I’m healthy.”

 “Why are you sick again? Did I allow you to be sick?” 

The male lead became obsessed with my health. Oh, please, can someone get rid of this guy! — I was definitely reincarnated as an extra with no presence. But my new life is unfolding strangely. 

“Why are you doing this for me?”

 “Because I like you.” 

Suddenly the sunny male lead started sticking to me.. 

“Mom, do it for me.”

 “I’m a man.”

And a handsome guardian who became my mother (gender: male)…

 “Hello, daughter!” 

Even a dad who was supposed to die appeared before me… Also.. 

“From today on, I’m your dad.”

 A suspicious human was aiming to become my dad. Why did I put myself in this undeserved situation as an extra? Can I really become healthy?

title: I’ll Save a Decent Family
summary:
Ji-Woo Lee, an author gets reincarnated into her novel as Tara Elias, the 5th daughter of the Elias family. However, the family is supposed to fall soon, and everyone in it will be executed. Ji-Woo insists that she will escape her fate.  
  
"I thought everything was going smoothly."  
  
That is, until she meets the second prince. Prince Kyle Amur.

---
*They walked over me. Now I rule over them.*

After being murdered, Yeonwoo is reincarnated as Tara Elias, the unremarkable and incompetent 5th daughter of the Elias family. How will Tara Elias, the nobody of the family, save the entire household from its grisly ending and become the ruler of the kingdom?

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55629319)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A7%9D%ED%95%A0-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%84-%EC%82%B4%EB%A0%A4%EB%B3%B4%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2381), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54740855)

* [Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt](https://pops.vn/comics/ta-se-cuu-lay-gia-toc-suy-tan-nay-5eeacb5be3d0a70034a66c97)

title: Why Do You Love Me When I Refuse Your Request?
summary:
Shuelina has only ever wanted to be loved as she grew up in an orphanage.
But after her birth father rejected her in a previous life, she tries to find a family who will accept her in this one.
Luckily, Archduke Bylot and his sons fall for her indomitable spirit, and they shower her with the love she has longed for.
But once they find out she's the long-lost imperial princess, can she be a part of their family?
Or will she have to go back to the people who sent her away in the first place?

(Source: Tapas)

___
Alternative Raw: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/-/4185)
Official JP translation: [Piccoma](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/173647)

title: My Affectionate Beast
summary:
The ‘Bluebird’s Letter’ exposed noble secrets, ruining families. When debates about its author raged, Kirien Kailos, the ‘Blood Wolf,’ confronted Saint Selene Leclair. 

“I know your secret,” he said, threatening to reveal her authorship unless she came to his mansion alone. 

Troubled, Selene sought advice from past saints. 

“Is he handsome?” they asked. 

“Yes,” she replied. 

“Then go. Life’s too short to miss opportunities."

title: I Became the Group’s Favorite Daughter
Exclusive maid of the evil empress
summary:
I, Paresa Menzel, a money-grubbing handmaiden to the infamous Empress. I thought she was the ultimate villainess, but she's nothing more than a prickly cat?! But then I realized that there was a lot more to her than meets the eyes, so I wanted to help her.
"If you are a spy disguised as a maid, I have no choice but to dispose of you."
But I never expected to be noticed by the crown prince. It's bad enough that my heart flutters every time I see the face of the most beautiful one in the empire...! I know I seem suspicious, but my loyalty to the Empress is genuine!

---
Paresa Menzel, lured by the promise of high pay, agrees to serve the empress who is known to be a cruel villainess. Anticipating evil incarnate, she instead finds a complex woman with hidden scars, which makes her solidify her vow to aid her. However, Paresa seems to be hiding something, which causes the crown prince to become suspicious of her. Though his captivating beauty unnerves her and challenges her resolve, Paresa's steadfast loyalty to the empress stands firm. Will her hidden past endanger them, or will it forge unexpected bonds in this dangerous game of deception and loyalty?

title: Sam Plays the Game
summary: No summary available.

title: Genius Grandson of the Loan Shark King
summary:
Kim Mu-hyuk, the grandson of the Loan Shark King Cheon Tae-san, whom even the wealthy elites of South Korea bowed to, strives to be recognized as a member of the Cheon Family. Despite his efforts, Mu-Hyuk is betrayed and killed by his uncles in a vicious struggle over his grandfather’s inheritance.

However, instead of dying, he wakes up in the 1990’s, with a second chance to rewrite his fate. Determined to prevent the death of his grandmother, who raised him, and reclaim the legacy of the Cheon family, Mu-hyuk sets out to preserve his severed friendships and take brutal revenge on his uncles and anyone else who stands in his way.

Will Kim Mu-hyuk, the grandson of the loan shark king be able to ascend to the throne of the ruthless Loan Shark Empire, feared by even gangsters?

title: You’re a Cat, But You’ve Been Adopted by a Wolf Family?
summary: No summary available.

title: I Became The Duke’s Male Servant
summary:
The handsome Duke Voreoti is the most terrifying man in the empire, with the coldest of demeanors and a gaze that can kill. But one day, he suddenly says that he wants to… adopt a child?! And that child is me?! After finding me at a shady orphanage, he whisked me away to his snowy palace without a second thought. Now I’m learning all the ways of the feared Voreoti family from his knights. However, things get dicey when the Duke becomes suspicious of my origins. With these fangs and jet black hair, perhaps we are more than just kindred spirits…

---
"I'm going to adopt a child."

Duke Phileo Boleoti's impulsive decision shocked everyone in the mansion. Not only did he make her his daughter, but he also gave her the name of a 'beast' that only direct members of the bloodline could receive.

"Even as you breathe right now, I'm earning money."
"It's confidence, not arrogance."
"My face really does have its advantages."
The most arrogant father in the whole world, and-

"I love muscles the most. Let's get muscular."
"Show me your thigh muscles! Your butt would be even better!"
"You're nothing but a flower if you have a calm personality…" his corrupted(?) daughter. 

And… "I will give his excellency the information he wants most."

"Information I want most, you say…"

"You won’t regret it."

…A stepmother(?) with a strange secret as well.

title: Adopted by a Murderous Duke Family
summary: After ten years of being exploited by Duke Gerwehr for her healing powers, Agnes meets her death in a dungeon. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her uncle's house before she was sold to Duke Gerwehr in the slave market. Desperate for her past life not to repeat itself, she lets Duke Rodwick adopt her and starts her new life with a new name, Tuariche Rodwick. Will she be able to keep her healing powers secret in this notorious family of assassins and find true happiness and love in her new life?

title: Things I Learned After Death
summary: As if being framed by her love for plotting a murder weren't enough, Rinette learns that her stepsister, Kanna, is the true mastermind behind it all. As she's burned at the stake, Rinette makes a desperate wish for another chance...and wakes up as her younger self. Determined to change her fate, she vows to stop Kanna's schemes and protect her family this time around. But rewriting the past is far from simple. Each choice she makes brings unforeseen consequences—some more devastating than she could imagine. Can Rinette escape the shadows of her past, or will they consume her once more?

title: I Was Just Having Fun With The Time Limit
summary: In a previous life I was seriously ill and now I also have an ill character. Perhaps it was my destiny to have a limited lifespan. Nevertheless, I am quite happy. ‘Now I have hair, I'm beautiful, I'm healthy, and I'm a princess, and by the way I can eat lots of delicious food! Life is like a gift. I've decided to make the most of the 21 years that have been given to me.... Until.

title: This Marriage Will Surely Succeed
summary:
Iona Modrov, known as the Emperor’s sword, hound, and secret lover, endures a harsh life as the illegitimate child of the Modrov family. Despite her sacrifices, she is forced into a political marriage and ultimately betrayed by the Emperor.

On the brink of death, the only one who comes to save her is her unwanted husband, Duke Leroy Han. In her final moments, she asks for a last kiss before dying—only to wake up in the past before everything went wrong.

Determined to change her fate, she runs to Leroy and boldly proposes:

“Duke, marry me. This time, I will make you happy!”

title: Heavenly Inquisition Sword
summary:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

title: The Heroine’s Friend Strikes Back
summary: Reborn as a side character wrongfully accused and executed, Mia resolves to rewrite her fate. Returning to the moment she first met the villainous heroine, she vows to stand tall and fight back, sparking a thrilling rebellion against a fabricated destiny.

title: The oppressed magic tool maker elopes with a mod butler
summary:
I never expected the dull servant to actually be a prince...!

Erin, a young girl who devotes herself to developing magical tools to fulfill her late mother’s dream of "making people happy with magic tools."

However, as the child of a mistress, Erin is in a difficult position and endures relentless harassment from her stepmother.

Despite her struggles to achieve her dream, Erin's hopes are crushed by her stepmother's schemes, and she is pushed to the depths of despair.

In her darkest moment, the only ally she has, the servant Foolda, reaches out to her.

"Would you elope with me?"

title: The Third Prince of the Fallen Kingdom has Regressed
summary:
The third prince of the Briall Kingdom, Yuri, runs away alone and saves his life at the last moment when the kingdom is about to fall. Wandering with regret and guilt, he eventually meets death. 

But when he opens his eyes again, he sees his father's familiar face...?

One painful regret is enough. Yuri will save the kingdom from destruction!

title: Conquering Dungeons With Copy Paste!
summary: Seo Han-Jun, the protagonist, is cursed by a Transcendent being with a skill called “Copy-Paste” (Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V) and given only 20 years to live. However, this skill only works on himself, and its growth is stunted, leading him to live a disregarded life as a low-level hunter. One day, while fighting in a dungeon, he discovers a way to develop his Copy-Paste skill! With this newfound power, he quickly becomes a world-class hunter. Now, together with his companions, Han-Junmust prevent the impending catastrophe. Will Seo Han-Jununcover the Transcendent’s identity and save the world?

title: After Becoming Financially Free, They Offered Their Loyalty
summary: Shen Yuan, handsome and rich, became a second-generation loser and was mercilessly abandoned by his money-worshipping girlfriend after his family’s business shut down. However, because of this, he obtained the [Perfect Life] system. As long as he spent money on the opposite sex with a favorability of 60, he could receive double the amount back. From that moment on, he made full use of the system to win the hearts of beautiful women and earn a fortune. The more he spent, the richer he became. He spent money like water and rose to the top 0.1%, living a happy entrepreneurial life filled with endless passion

title: My ex-husband wants to reconcile
summary: Ye Linghan’s wish to remarry his ex-husband, Ji Ran, turned the latter from an Alpha to an Omega. Despite enduring the physical changes and the pain of rejection, Ji Ran also endured Ye Linghan’s repeated hurtful behavior. When Ye Linghan finally divorced him, Ji Ran was left heartbroken. As for Ye Linghan, he got what he wanted, but upon looking at the empty villa, he suddenly came to his senses.

title: The Male Lead? I Don’t Want Him
summary:
I reincarnated as Luna, a supporting character who is accused of ruining the heroine and hero’s relationship, and is murdered. I’m not interested in someone else’s man, but the heroine’s friends bully me every day.

*“Why are you trying to get close to someone who’s already taken?”*

*“That’s right, please stop! Why are doing this?”*

*“Stop doing such terrible things!”*

So Luna decides to announce it in front of everyone: “I don’t want someone like Fersen even if you beg me to take him so stop bothering me. I’d rather date Anthes Vincent, who’s rumored to be insane.”

And soon she meets someone who she never expected to meet…

“I heard you have an interest in me? The truth is, I do too. Is it a coincidence?”
